discourse_list.title: Vote was canceled. We need a point of no return timelock I think

content.content: uniswapvote779×537 46.3 KB  First, we need notification emails when a vote is live. no excuse for this not being in effect yet. Second, we need a timelock where after a certain period of time (ie 3 days), a vote goes forward AND CANNOT BE CANCELED.

EPNS announced governance notifications on snapshot.  twitter.com   Ethereum Push Notification Service | EPNS @epnsproject    @polkadog_ @brendan_dharma @spencernoon Already on it, governance happening on Snapshot will be notified very soon along w/ the option to chose from the frontend itself. We're also working with Uniswap to notify your LP positions coming out of range. https://t.co/fCDD9BE9xm UniV3 LP demo ⤵️ https://t.co/jgrHvbf9U7   6:31 AM - 19 Aug 2021           6
